content: कुड्मल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [<ls>Uṇ. 1. 106</ls>] Opening, full-blown, expanding, (as the blossom of a flower); <ls>R. 18. 37.</ls> --लः An opening bud; विजृंभणोद्गंधिषु कुड्मलेषु <ls>R. 16. 47</ls>; <ls>U. 6. 17</ls>; <ls>Śi. 2. 7.</ls> --लं A particular hell; <ls>Ms. 4. 89</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 222.</ls>
